price: 6. Toysa Nabiyow derre keenit cab, keenih qambal israafiil deqsita malaykatti seeca ayró baantat waagaleeh hagga leemih fan. (cisab booxá kinnuk).
arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu al-dāʿi ilā shayin nukurin
